file.name: themes.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
x-aliases:
    AssetOut: &AssetOut
        type:
            description: The type of the asset.
            type: string
        url:
            type: string
            description: Absolute URL of the asset.
        content-type:
            description: The content-type of the asset.
            type: string
            example: application/json
    StringAssetOut: &StringAssetOut
        <<: *AssetOut
        data:
            type: string
            description: Contents of the asset. May require an expand parameter to retreive.
    ThemeSlug: &ThemeSlug
        description: Unique theme slug.
        in: path
        name: themeID
        required: true
        schema:
            type: string
    AssetNotFound: &AssetNotFound
        description: JavaScript could not be found.
        content:
            application/json:
                schema:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                        description:
                            description: Verbose description of the error.
                            nullable: true
                            type: string
                        message:
                            description: Short description of the error.
                            type: string
                        status:
                            description: Status code of the error response.
                            type: integer
                    required:
                        - description
                        - message
                        - status
paths:
    /themes:
        get:
            parameters:
                - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ExpandAssetsParam"
            responses:
                "200":
                    content:
                        "application/json":
                            schema:
                                items:
                                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/Themes"
                                type: array
                    description: Success
            tags:
                - Themes
            summary: Get all themes available.
    /themes/current:
        get:
            summary: Get the current theme.
            parameters:
                - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ExpandAssetsParam"
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        "application/json":
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Theme"
                    description: Success
            tags:
                - Themes
    /themes/{themeID}:
        get:
            parameters:
                - $ref: "#/components/parameters/ExpandAssetsParam"
                - *ThemeSlug
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        "application/json":
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/Theme"
                    description: Success
            tags:
                - Themes
            summary: Get a theme.
    /themes/{themeID}/revisions:
        get:
            parameters:
                - description: Unique themeID.
                  in: path
                  name: themeID
                  required: true
                  schema:
                      type: integer
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        "application/json":
                            schema:
                                type: array
                                items:
                                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/Theme"
                    description: Success
            tags:
                - Themes
            summary: Get all revisions for a theme.
    /themes/{themeID}/assets/footer.html:
        get:
            parameters:
                - *ThemeSlug
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        text/html:
                            schema:
                                type: string
                    description: Success
                404: *AssetNotFound
            tags:
                - Theme Assets
            summary: Get the footer HTML of a theme.
    /themes/{themeID}/assets/footer:
        get:
            parameters:
                - *ThemeSlug
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThemeFooterAsset"
                    description: Success
                404: *AssetNotFound
            tags:
                - Theme Assets
            summary: Get the footer HTML of a theme.
    /themes/{themeID}/assets/header.html:
        get:
            parameters:
                - *ThemeSlug
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        text/html:
                            schema:
                                type: string
                    description: Success
                404: *AssetNotFound
            tags:
                - Theme Assets
            summary: Get the header HTML of a theme.
    /themes/{themeID}/assets/header:
        get:
            parameters:
                - *ThemeSlug
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThemeHeaderAsset"
                    description: Success
                404: *AssetNotFound
            tags:
                - Theme Assets
            summary: Get the header HTML of a theme.
    /themes/{themeID}/assets/javascript.js:
        get:
            parameters:
                - *ThemeSlug
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        application/javascript:
                            schema:
                                type: string
                    description: Success
                404: *AssetNotFound
            tags:
                - Theme Assets
            summary: Get JavaScript to be used as part of a theme.
    /themes/{themeID}/assets/javascript:
        get:
            parameters:
                - *ThemeSlug
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThemeJavascriptAsset"
                    description: Success
                404: *AssetNotFound
            tags:
                - Theme Assets
            summary: Get JavaScript to be used as part of a theme.
    /themes/{themeID}/assets/scripts.json:
        get:
            parameters:
                - *ThemeSlug
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                items:
                                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThemeScript"
                                type: array
                    description: Success
                404: *AssetNotFound
            tags:
                - Theme Assets
            summary: Get additional script files of a theme.
    /themes/{themeID}/assets/scripts:
        get:
            parameters:
                - *ThemeSlug
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThemeScriptsAsset"
                    description: Success
                404: *AssetNotFound
            tags:
                - Theme Assets
            summary: Get additional script files of a theme.
    /themes/{themeID}/assets/styles.css:
        get:
            parameters:
                - *ThemeSlug
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        text/css:
                            schema:
                                type: string
                    description: Success
                404: *AssetNotFound
            tags:
                - Theme Assets
            summary: Get theme styles.
    /themes/{themeID}/assets/styles:
        get:
            parameters:
                - *ThemeSlug
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThemeCssAsset"
                    description: Success
                404: *AssetNotFound
            tags:
                - Theme Assets
            summary: Get theme styles.
    /themes/{themeID}/assets/variables.json:
        get:
            parameters:
                - *ThemeSlug
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                type: object
                    description: Success
                404: *AssetNotFound
            tags:
                - Theme Assets
            summary: Get theme variables.
    /themes/{themeID}/assets/variables:
        get:
            parameters:
                - *ThemeSlug
            responses:
                200:
                    content:
                        application/json:
                            schema:
                                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThemeVariablesAsset"
                    description: Success
                404: *AssetNotFound
            tags:
                - Theme Assets
            summary: Get theme variables.
components:
    parameters:
        ExpandAssetsParam:
            in: query
            name: expand
            description: >
                Expand associated records using one or more valid field names. A
                value of `all` will expand all expandable fields.
                style
            schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/ExpandAssetsValues"
            style: form
    schemas:
        ExpandAssetsValues:
            type: array
            items:
                type: string
                enum:
                    - all
                    - javascript.data
                    - css.data
                    - variables.data
                    - header.data
                    - footer.data
        Theme:
            properties:
                themeID:
                    type: string
                    description: Unique ID of the theme.
                version:
                    type: string
                    description: Theme version.
                name:
                    description: Theme name.
                    type: string
                parentTheme:
                    type: string
                    description: Parent theme template
                parentVersion:
                    type: string
                    description: Parent theme template version
                revisionID:
                    type: integer
                    description: Theme revision ID
                revisionName:
                    type: string
                    description: Theme revision name
                assets:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThemeAssets"
                preview:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/PreviewAssets"
            required:
                - assets
                - type
                - themeID
                - version
            type: object
        Themes:
            properties:
                assets:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThemeAssets"
                preview:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/PreviewAssets"
                type:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                        - themeFile
                themeID:
                    type: integer
                version:
                    type: string
            required:
                - assets
                - type
                - themeID
                - version
            type: object
        ThemeAssets:
            description: Assets to include in a page as part of the theme.
            properties:
                header:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThemeHeaderAsset"
                footer:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThemeFooterAsset"
                javascript:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThemeJavascriptAsset"
                scripts:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThemeScriptsAsset"
                styles:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThemeCssAsset"
                variables:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThemeVariablesAsset"
                logo:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThemeLogoAsset"
                mobileLogo:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThemeMobileLogoAsset"
            type: object
        ThemeFooterAsset:
            description: Custom footer HTML.
            properties:
                <<: *StringAssetOut
            required:
                - url
                - type
            type: object
        ThemeHeaderAsset:
            description: Custom header HTML.
            properties:
                <<: *StringAssetOut
            required:
                - url
                - type
            type: object
        ThemeJavascriptAsset:
            description: Javascript for the theme.
            properties:
                <<: *StringAssetOut
            required:
                - url
                - type
            type: object
        ThemeCssAsset:
            description: CSS for the theme.
            properties:
                <<: *StringAssetOut
            required:
                - data
                - type
            type: object
        ThemeScript:
            properties:
                url:
                    type: string
            required:
                - url
            type: object
        ThemeScriptsAsset:
            description: External script files to be included.
            properties:
                <<: *AssetOut
                data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                        $ref: "#/components/schemas/ThemeScript"
            required:
                - url
                - type
            type: object
        ThemeVariablesAsset:
            description: A collection of variables intended to be used by theme.
            properties:
                <<: *AssetOut
                data:
                    type: object
                    description: JSON contents of the asset.
            required:
                - url
                - type
            type: object
        ThemeLogoAsset:
            description: Site logo to be displayed in the theme.
            properties: *AssetOut
            type: object
        ThemeMobileLogoAsset:
            description: Site logo to be displayed in the theme when viewed on a mobile device.
            properties: *AssetOut
            type: object
        PreviewAssets:
            description: A collections of variables to generate a preview.
            properties:
                preset:
                    type: string
                globalPrimary:
                    type: string
                    nullable: true
                globalBg:
                    type: string
                    nullable: true
                globalFg:
                    type: string
                    nullable: true
                titleBarBg:
                    type: string
                    nullable: true
                titleBarFg:
                    type: string
                    nullable: true
                backgroundImage:
                    type: string
                    nullable: true
            type: object

Error:
unmarshal: yaml: unmarshal errors:
  yaml: line 6: cannot unmarshal !!map into string; yaml: line 6: cannot unmarshal !!map into string; yaml: line 6: cannot unmarshal !!map into string; yaml: line 6: cannot unmarshal !!map into string; yaml: line 6: cannot unmarshal !!map into string; yaml: line 6: cannot unmarshal !!map into string
